name: A Beaming Friendship
description:
Description - 

Billy and Bob have been best friends for life, nothing to get in their way. When put in two spaceships, they single-handedly created world peace. After realizing their friendship is what gives them immense power, green villains have decided to destroy their connection. Protect the spaceships, protect the connection!!!

Instructions - 

Don't get hit by the green villains, don't let them hit the connection tower. Survive the 10 waves.

Controls - 

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse - Single Fire

Hold Right Mouse - Laser Beam of Friendship
